product.name: Modern Black Farmhouse Pendant Light with Glass Shade,Industrial Pendant Lighting, Adjustable Hanging Light Fixtures, Farmhouse Pendant Lighting
product.description: ELECTRICAL SPECIFICATIONS Max Wattage: 60 watts Number of Bulbs: 1 Max Watts Per Bulb: 60 watts Bulb Base: Medium (E26) Bulb Included: No Modern Glass Pendant Light Farmhouse Pendant Lighting 2 x Glass Pendant Light 2 x Accessories Pack 1 x User Instructions
product.bullet_points:
• 【PENDANTS PERFECT FOR YOUR SPACE】 - The matte black pendant light is ideal for a variety of spaces, from farmhouse pendant lighting for kitchens to pendant lights for bathrooms. It's great in dining rooms, bars, kitchen counters, over sinks and in bedrooms. This pendant light works with industrial, modern and transitional designs.
• 【ADJUSTABLE LIGHT FIXTURE】: Base diameter 4.7 inch, wire length 55 inch.The farmhouse pendant light is designed with adjustable hanging ceiling light cord. The cord can be adjustable up to 59 inches max. You can adjust the height of the pendant lamps according to the ceiling of you house, creating a sense of beauty to the ceiling.
• 【PERFECT INSTALLATION SIZE】: The farmhouse pendant light is with a matte black finish. All mounting hardware and installation guide are included in the pendant ceiling light package for quick installation, just need to connect the wire and assemble the shade only, saving costs for hiring an electrician
• 【BULB REQUIREMENTS】: You can use any E26 standard base bulbs (Max 60W for each bulb) such as LED, CFL, incandescent, and halogen bulbs for these kitchen lights ceiling. Bulbs are not included,. You can choose different style bulbs and color temperatures to create multiple atmospheres in your house.
• 【WARRANTY】: This pendant light comes with our strong 3 year warranty ; try it at no risk and watch it brighten your life for years to come
